Definition.WordDefinition: Clark, CO Zip code(s): 80428 Clark, MO (city, FIPS 14068) Location: 39.28060 N, 92.34186 W Population (1990): 257 (124 housing units) Area: 0.6 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 65243 Clark, NJ (CDP, FIPS 13180) Location: 40.62105 N, 74.31154 W Population (1990): 14629 (5638 housing units) Area: 11.3 sq km (land), 0.4 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 07066 Clark, PA (borough, FIPS 13832) Location: 41.28529 N, 80.40416 W Population (1990): 610 (207 housing units) Area: 7.9 sq km (land), 1.9 sq km (water) Clark, SD (city, FIPS 12180) Location: 44.88074 N, 97.73381 W Population (1990): 1292 (631 housing units) Area: 3.3 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 57225

Clark n 1: United States explorer who (with Meriwether Lewis) led an expedition from St. Louis to the mouth of the Columbia River; Clark was responsible for making maps of the area (1770-1838) [syn: {William Clark}] 2: United States general who was Allied commander in Africa and Italy in World War II and was commander of the United Nations forces in Korea (1896-1984) [syn: {Mark Clark}, {Mark Wayne Clark}] 3: United States psychologist (born in Panama) whose research persuaded the Supreme Court that segregated schools were discriminatory (1914-) [syn: {Kenneth Clark}, {Kenneth Bancroft Clark}] 4: Canadian politician who served as prime minister (1939-) [syn: {Joe Clark}, {Charles Joseph Clark}]
